definition: to try/to make an attempt/to think of a way (to accomplish sth)
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])
to think up every possible method (idiom); to devise ways and means/to try this, that and the other

sentences.english: Can I manage to make it back in one piece?
sentences.chinese: 我可否設法把它一次搬回來？

sentences.english: We are trying to help out by delivering flour to bakeries.
sentences.chinese: 我們正在設法給麪包店送去麪粉，幫助它們度過難關。

sentences.english: We're trying to solve the difficult problem by ourselves.
sentences.chinese: 我們正設法自己解決這個難題。

sentences.english: No matter what hurdles are placed in our way, somehow we always find a way.
sentences.chinese: 不管我們事業上有多麼困難，我們總會設法闖過去。

sentences.english: Bassanio tried to keep Antonio from accepting these terms.
sentences.chinese: 巴薩尼奧設法阻止安東尼奧接受條件。

sentences.english: The boys are trying to devise some scheme of earning money.
sentences.chinese: 孩子們在設法構想掙錢的妙策。

sentences.english: They managed to escape just before dawn.
sentences.chinese: 就在黎明之前，他們設法逃了出來。

sentences.english: The other countries must therefore find further cuts of 2.6bn tonnes.
sentences.chinese: 其他國家就必須設法再削減26億噸。

sentences.english: She tried to reduce her weight.
We tried to discourage him from climbing the mountain without a guide.
sentences.chinese: 我們曾設法勸他在無嚮導的情況下不要去爬山。

sentences.english: We will try and carry him on board the tartan .
sentences.chinese: 我們設法來把他擡到船上去吧。

sentences.english: She manoeuvred her friends into positions of power.
sentences.chinese: 她設法使她的朋友們掌了權。

sentences.english: Try to fix the meeting for Tuesday.
sentences.chinese: 設法把會議安排在星期二。

sentences.english: I suppose every foreigner would manage to see one.
sentences.chinese: 我想每個外國人都會設法去看看的。

sentences.english: The well- drilled crew managed to rescue most of the passengers.
sentences.chinese: 訓練有素的機組人員設法營救出了大部分乘客。

sentences.english: ShangHeng saw her carrying luggage, managed to keep her.
sentences.chinese: 尚恆看見她帶着行李，設法留住她。

definition: to fight for/to strive for/to win over
to separate oneself from/to break away from/diastasis (medicine)/abscission/abjunction (botany)
in order to/for the purpose of/so as to
to make a supreme effort/at all costs
